title: Gangster
desc:
Post 50
***Drive-By Shooting** (2x, Charge 110%, Unlocked)*
Attack every player who scored lower than you with half your attack power. Players who survive won't know they were attacked. Automatically locks after night 3.
***Sell Drugs** (0x, Charge 150%)*
Roleblock your target and permanently reduce their defense power by 0.1x, or 0.2x if above 1.0x.
***Street Fight** (Locked)*
Unlocked after night 3. Rampage attack your target.
